title: card.wireless Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: View the last known network state, or customize the behavior of the modem. _Note: Be careful when using this mode with hardware not on hand as a mistake may cause loss of network and Notehub access._

apn.description: Access Point Name (APN) when using an external SIM. Use `"-"` to reset to the Notecard default APN.

hours.description: When using the `method` argument with `"dual-primary-secondary"` or `"dual-secondary-primary"`, this is the number of hours after which the Notecard will attempt to switch back to the preferred SIM.

method.description: Used when configuring a [Notecard to failover to a different SIM](/guides-and-tutorials/notecard-guides/using-external-sim-cards/#failing-over-to-a-different-sim).

sub-descriptions.description: Resets the Notecard to the default method.
Will attempt to register with the internal SIM first, then failover to the external SIM.
Will attempt to register with the external SIM first, then failover to the internal SIM.
Will exclusively use the internal SIM.
Will exclusively use the external SIM.

mode.description: Network scan mode. Must be one of:

sub-descriptions.description: Perform automatic band scan mode (this is the default mode).
Restrict the modem to Cat-M1 (applies exclusively to Narrowband Notecard Cellular devices).
Restrict the modem to Cat-NB1 (applies exclusively to Narrowband Notecard Cellular devices).
Restrict the modem to EGPRS (applies exclusively to Narrowband Notecard Cellular devices).

samples.title: Current Network State
samples.description: Request current network state without any modifications.

samples.title: Change Scan Mode
samples.description: Restrict the modem to Cat-NB1 for narrowband connectivity.

samples.title: Reset Scan Mode
samples.description: Reset network scan mode to default behavior.

samples.title: Set External SIM APN
samples.description: Configure APN for external SIM card usage.

samples.title: Failover to External SIM
samples.description: Configure dual SIM failover with external SIM priority.
